text: niyata vasayenma kavurun ho pratiksepa kara, allahge margayehi (yamada) valakva, (makkava vana) ehi vasaya karannan vuvada, pitata vasaya karannan vuvada, minisun siyallantama samana vana paridden api æti kala parisuddha vu næmadumpalata yamada valakva, (dharmayata) patahæniva aparadha kirimata adahas kalahot ovunta vedana gena dena danduvama vindina lesata api salasvannemu
